DOC.brief_summary: Aims Objectives Aim To determine effect delivery room Skin To Skin contact breast feed behavior term neonate bear normal vaginal delivery 36-48 hour . Objectives Primary objective To determine effect delivery room Skin To Skin contact breast feed behaviour term neonate bear normal vaginal delivery , 36-48 hour ( measure Infant Breast Feeding Score ) video record use randomize controlled design . Secondary objective To determine effect delivery room Skin Skin contact 1 . Salivary cortisol 6 hour measure electrochemiluminescence immunoassay ( ECLIA ) 2 . Weight 48 hour measure digital infant weigh scale . 3 . Maternal perception breast milk output , breast consistency , infant 's feeding activity 36-48 hour measure score graded satisfy , satisfy , acceptable satisfy . 4 . Number duration feed session till 48 hr accord mother assess 48 hour 5 . Breast feed rate 6 week measure time vaccination time visit hospital ask telephonic conversation . Hypothesis Infants receive skin skin contact compare neonate receive , demonstrate good breast feed behaviour .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Early Skin Skin Contact Breast Feeding Behaviour Term Newborns : A Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion exclusion criterion enrollment subject study Inclusion criterion Term baby bear mother normal vaginal delivery study period . Exclusion criteria 1 . Babies major congenital malformation . 2 . Multiple pregnancy 3 . Babies require resuscitation beyond initial step 4 . Babies require care neonatal intensive care unit . 5 . Maternal problem require immediate care - Severe preeclampsia define Blood pressure 160/110 , Proteinuria 3+ , Oliguria le 500 ml , Pulmonary edema , cerebral visual disturbance , Impaired liver function , Thrombocytopenia , Epigastric Pain - Imminent eclampsia - Severe bleed - Mother significant surgical medical illness require separation baby mother . 6 . Small date large date baby 7 . Infants diabetic mother 8 . Maternal refusal consent Outcome Measures : 1 . Measurement Breast feed Behavior 36-48 hour use Infant Breast feed Behavior scale 2 . Salivary Cortisol 3 . Weight birth 4 . Weight 48 hour 5 . Number feeding session till 48 hour 6 . Maternal Perception Infant activity , feed breast milk output .
